p: At the beginning of the study the mean weight Z-score was − 1.3 ± 1.4; it was − 0.9 ± 1.6 at the end of the study. There was no correlation between weight Z-score differences between the start and the end of the study and the number of viral RTIs occurring during the year (Pearson correlation, r = − 0.1708, p = 0.4142).
